statements: SELECT * FROM packaging_components;
SELECT label, barcode FROM packaging_components;
SELECT * FROM packaging_components WHERE serial_number = '1234';
SELECT id, label, serial_number FROM packaging_components ORDER BY label ASC;
SELECT id, barcode FROM packaging_components ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM packaging_components WHERE serial_number = '123456'
SELECT id, label FROM packaging_components WHERE barcode LIKE '12%'
SELECT * FROM packaging_components WHERE serial_number = '789012' OR barcode = 'ABC123'
SELECT * FROM packaging_components WHERE label = 'Box' ORDER BY serial_number DESC
SELECT id, label, barcode, serial_number FROM packaging_components
SELECT * FROM packaging_labels;
SELECT label_text FROM packaging_labels WHERE label_id = 1;
SELECT barcode_value FROM packaging_barcode;

SELECT * FROM packaging_labels WHERE label_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM packaging_labels WHERE label_id = 1;
SELECT label_text, label_id FROM packaging_labels WHERE label_text LIKE '%packaging%';
SELECT label_id, label_text FROM packaging_labels ORDER BY label_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM packaging_labels WHERE label_text IS NOT NULL;
SELECT barcode_id, barcode_value FROM packaging_barcode ORDER BY barcode_id ASC;

SELECT label_name, label_description FROM Labels ORDER BY label_name DESC;
SELECT Labels.label_name, Barcodes.barcode_value FROM Labels INNER JOIN Barcodes ON Labels.label_id = Barcodes.product_id;

SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_labels FROM Labels;

SELECT label_name, creation_date FROM labels ORDER BY label_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, category FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';

SELECT serial_number_value FROM serial_numbers WHERE product_id = 2 ORDER BY serial_number_id ASC;

SELECT label_name, label_type FROM labels WHERE manufacturer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name FROM products ORDER BY product_name DESC;
